categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ukadan was a male Human who served as a specialist in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, he was stationed at the South Tram Station in the Axial Park region of the planet Corellia, distributing stimulants and medical supplies to other Imperial forces.
Specialist Ukadan appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Stims Vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
